recipe.content:
services:
 dev-machine:
  image: arecio/express-unify
  command: /app-entrypoint.sh nami start --foreground express

commands.name: 2. Stop
commands.commandLine: print-help && cd ${current.project.path} && pkill -u bitnami node && echo "Web server stopped."

commands.name: 1. Create and run project
commands.commandLine: print-help && cd ${current.project.path} && npm install express@4.13.4 && express -f . && cp -rn /bitnami/mongodb/conf ${current.project.path} && npm install mongodb@2.1.18 --save && npm install && counter=0; until nc -z localhost 27017; do counter=$((counter+1)); if [ $counter == 10 ]; then echo "Error: Couldn't connect to MongoDB."; exit 1; fi; echo "Trying to connect to MongoDB at localhost. Attempt $counter."; sleep 5; done; echo "Connected to MongoDB database. Starting application server." && npm start
